question:
Global GDP (Gross Domestic Product) was $69.97 trillion in 2011. If the world population for 2011 was best estimated at 6,973,738,433, approximately what is the global GDP per person?
(A) $10
(B) $100
(C) $1,000
(D) $10,000
(E) $100,000
